channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: WhatsApp will gradually stop working if you don't agree to its new privacy policy
item.description: With its controversial privacy policy slated to go into effect this weekend, WhatsApp says it won't delete or deactivate the accounts of individuals who don't want to share their information with Facebook.

item.title: 'Gears 5' studio is moving to Unreal Engine 5 for 'next-gen development'
item.description: The Coalition says not to expect new game announcements anytime soon.

item.title: Facebook test encourages people to read articles before sharing
item.description: Facebook has started testing a new interface feature that will prompt people to at least open a link before they share it with their network.

item.title: Sony's WF-1000XM4 earbuds could feature a new design
item.description: Leaked images suggest they'll look vastly different from the terrific WF-1000XM3.

item.title: Xbox Series X and PlayStation 5: The six-month report card
item.description: Are Microsoft and Sony even competing with each other anymore?

item.title: Harley-Davidson anoints LiveWire as its official electric bike brand
item.description: Back in 2019, Harley-Davidson released the LiveWire, its first all-electric motorcycle. Now it plans to use the LiveWire name to launch an all-electric motorcycle brand.

item.title: NASA and Axiom Space's first private ISS mission could happen as soon as January
item.description: Four astronauts will make the trip aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon module.

item.title: The best games for PlayStation 5
item.description: Welcome to our inaugural edition of our best games list for PlayStation 5 — the ten games we think you should play above any other on the platform.

item.title: Ford will reveal the F-150 Lightning EV on May 19th
item.description: After years of showing off prototypes, Ford will finally detail a consumer version of its upcoming electric F-150 truck

item.title: FDA approves the first smart insulin pen cap to help with dosing
item.description: Bigfoot Unity works with Abbott's FreeStyle Libre 2 glucose monitoring system.

item.title: ‘VVVVVV’ creator Terry Cavanagh’s new game only exists inside ‘Roblox’
item.description: Terry Cavanagh, best known for his work on VVVVVV and Super Hexagon, has released a free new game you can play inside of Roblox.

item.title: 44 state AGs ask Facebook to abandon 'Instagram for Kids'
item.description: Today, 44 Attorneys General wrote a letter to Facebook asking it to abandon its plan to launch a version of Instagram specifically for kids.

item.title: Apple's MacBook Air M1 returns to record low of $899
item.description: Amazon knocks $100 off Apple's latest MacBook Air M1, bringing it down to $899.

item.title: 'Apex Legends' esports viewership enjoyed a 50 percent boost this winter
item.description: The Apex Legends Global Series Winter Circuit playoffs have become the franchise's most-watched competition.

item.title: This $80 HP portable photo printer can fit in your pocket
item.description: The HP Sprocket Portable 2"x3" Instant Photo Printer is a compact portable printer roughly the size of a smartphone that can produce smudge-free photos directly from your phone.

item.title: Homeland Security's warning system combs social media for terrorist threats
item.description: Homeland Security is debuting a warning system that looks for signs of terrorist threats in social media posts, although there's a worry it will chill free speech.

item.title: Spotify lets you share a specific timestamp from a podcast
item.description: It’ll be easier to get friends to listen to a specific part of an episode.

item.title: Amazon's palm-reading payment tech is now available in New York City
item.description: Amazon One palm payments are now available in New York City — if only through one store for now.

item.title: The 44mm Galaxy Watch Active 2 drops to $180 at Amazon
item.description: Save big on Samsung's Galaxy Watch Active 2 -- Amazon has the 44mm model for $180, or $90 off its normal price.

item.title: The Morning After: Debris from China's largest rocket crashes into Indian Ocean
item.description: Dogecoin price crashes after Elon Musk's 'Saturday Night Live' appearance, Chinese rocket debris falls into Indian Ocean, and only 4 percent of US iPhone users have agreed to app tracking after iOS 14.5.

item.title: UK postal service tests autonomous drone deliveries to remote islands
item.description: The Royal Mail will deliver parcels using drones to the Scilly Isles as part of a government-backed trial.

item.title: US cracks down on 'bulletproof hosting' providers that enabled malware attacks
item.description: Four individuals behind a so-called "bulletproof hosting" site have pleaded guilty to US racketeering charges, the Department of Justice (DoJ) has announced.

item.title: The first flight unit comprised of Space Force Guardians has completed basic training
item.description: The first flight comprised entirely of US Space Force Guardians recently graduated from Air Force Basic Military Training.

item.title: Sony reportedly warned that PS5 shortages may continue until 2022
item.description: Sony is selling a lot of PlayStation 5s, but it may be some time before the console hits its true sales potential.

item.title: Apple may switch to its own 5G iPhone modems by 2023
item.description: Apple's purchase of Intel's 5G smartphone modem business in 2019 may start to pay dividends by 2023.
